slider1.title: located to ease your health care journey.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.description: Welcome to our medical building, home to a diverse range of specialized doctors dedicated to providing the highest standard of care. With a collaborative approach, we ensure that you receive comprehensive medical services under one roof, making your healthcare journey seamless and efficient.

numbers.title: CARING FOR THE HEALTH OF YOU AND YOUR FAMILY.
numbers.description: We will work with you to develop individualised care plans, including management of chronic diseases. If we cannot assist, we can provide referrals or advice about the type of practitioner you require. We treat all enquiries sensitively and in the strictest confidence.

faq.question: What are the symptoms of a heart attack?
faq.answer: Symptoms include chest pain, shortness of breath, nausea, excessive sweating, and pain in the arm or jaw.

faq.question: What is the difference between a virus and bacteria?
faq.answer: Viruses are smaller than bacteria and cannot be treated with antibiotics, whereas bacteria can be eliminated using antibiotics.

faq.question: What is the best way to strengthen the immune system?
faq.answer: Eat a healthy diet, exercise, get enough sleep, and avoid smoking and stress.

faq.question: Is drinking a lot of water good for health?
faq.answer: Yes, drinking water is essential for maintaining hydration and improving body functions.

contact.title: contact us
contact.description: We will be happy to receive your inquiries and suggestions.
contact.name: name
contact.phoneValidation: You must enter an Egyptian phone number
